message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further and exploring options that work for both of us.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,500,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.
